subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Drew Brees passed for 445 yards and 3 touchdowns in the Saints’ fourth straight victory, a 41-24 win over the Jaguars. Of his 35 completions, 25 were for first downs.
snippet: Drew Brees passed for 445 yards and 3 touchdowns in the Saints’ fourth straight victory, a 41-24 win over the Jaguars. Of his 35 completions, 25 were for first downs.
